content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Greetings, Emilia. Thank you for your interest in our apartment in Duisburg. Let us focus on discussing the rental price at this moment. 

As a starting point, I have in mind a monthly fee of 1200 Euros. However, I'm flexible and would consider lowering it slightly depending on the lease term you propose. But remember, this premium location and modern apartment come with certain expectations. TERMINATE if you wish to walk away or if we reach an agreement with the price stated as [1200].
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
